tagline: Fast Cash When You Need It Most

about.story: Founded in 2008, Lion Cash Advance started with a simple mission: to provide fast, accessible cash advances to hardworking Americans who needed emergency funds. What began as a single location in downtown Miami has grown into a trusted network serving customers across Florida and California. We've stayed true to our founding principles - transparency, speed, and customer respect - while building one of the most reliable cash advance services in the region.
about.employees: 250+ licensed loan officers and support staff
about.mission: To provide honest, fast, and transparent cash advance solutions to working families and individuals facing financial emergencies.
about.companyPhilosophy: We believe everyone deserves access to quick cash when life happens. No judgment, no complicated applications - just straightforward service from people who understand your situation.

licenses: Florida Division of Financial Services - Consumer Finance License
California Department of Financial Protection and Innovation (DFPI) - Finance Lender License
Licensed in all counties where we operate
certifications: Certified by the National Foundation for Credit Counseling
Annual FDIC training and compliance certification
qualifications.insurance: Full E&O Insurance (Errors and Omissions) - $5M coverage
qualifications.compliance: CCPA (California Consumer Privacy Act) compliant, ECOA (Equal Credit Opportunity Act) compliant, FDCPA compliant
guarantees: Transparent, upfront pricing - no hidden fees
Same-day funding available for approved applications
All employees background-checked and trained in fair lending

availability.standardHours: Monday-Friday 8:00 AM - 6:00 PM, Saturday 9:00 AM - 4:00 PM
availability.phoneSupport: Monday-Friday 8:00 AM - 7:00 PM, Saturday 9:00 AM - 5:00 PM
availability.approvalTime: As fast as 15 minutes for online applications

testimonials.text: I needed money fast for a car repair and Lion Cash Advance came through. Applied online at 10 AM, got approved by noon, and had the money in my account by 3 PM. Couldn't ask for better service. Will definitely use them again.
testimonials.author: Marcus Johnson

testimonials.text: The team was so understanding about my situation. No judgment, no pressure. They explained everything clearly and got me the cash I needed for medical bills. Best experience I've had with a lending service.
testimonials.author: Jennifer Santos

testimonials.text: Finally found a lending company that's straightforward about costs and doesn't try to hide things. The staff actually listened to my situation and found a loan that worked for my budget. Highly recommend!
testimonials.author: Robert Chen

testimonials.text: Emergency medical situation, needed cash immediately. Lion Cash Advance approved me in 20 minutes and I had funds that same day. Their online application is incredibly user-friendly.
testimonials.author: Patricia Rodriguez

testimonials.text: Honest pricing, fast service, and professional staff. I've used other cash advance places before and Lion is by far the best. They treat you like a person, not just another transaction.
testimonials.author: David Williams

testimonials.text: Applied for a loan to cover unexpected home repairs. The entire process took 30 minutes and I had the money by the next business day. The staff explained everything clearly and answered all my questions.
testimonials.author: Maria Fernandez

uniqueSellingPoints: Fast approval - as little as 15 minutes
Transparent pricing with no hidden fees
Multiple loan options to fit your needs
Expert team of licensed loan officers

Written disclosure of all terms before loan

florida.disclosure: Florida law requires full transparency of all costs before you borrow. Lion Cash Advance exceeds these requirements with clear, upfront pricing.

california.regulatedBy: Department of Financial Protection and Innovation (DFPI)
california.maxAPY: No specific APY cap - rates vary by lender
california.fees: Finance charges vary by lender and loan terms
consumerProtections: Right to cancel without penalty within 3 business days
Clear written disclosure of all terms
Cannot roll over loans more than 3 times
california.disclosure: California law strictly regulates deferred deposit transactions. Lion Cash Advance complies with all DFPI requirements and provides clear disclosure of all terms and costs.

values.fairLending: Lion Cash Advance is committed to equal opportunity lending. We do not discriminate based on race, color, religion, national origin, sex, marital status, age, or any other protected characteristic.

faqs.question: How fast can I get approved?
faqs.answer: Most customers are approved in as little as 15 minutes with our online application. In-store approvals can happen even faster.

faqs.question: How long does it take to get the money?
faqs.answer: We offer same-day funding for most approved applications. Funds are typically deposited to your account within 24 hours.

faqs.question: What do I need to apply?
faqs.answer: You'll need a valid ID, proof of income, and an active checking account. That's it - no credit check required!

faqs.question: Are there any hidden fees?
faqs.answer: No. We provide complete transparency about all costs upfront. You'll know exactly what you owe before you borrow.

faqs.question: What if I can't repay on time?
faqs.answer: Contact us immediately. We work with customers to find solutions and may be able to extend your loan or create a payment plan.

faqs.question: Do you check credit?
faqs.answer: No credit check required! We focus on your income and ability to repay, not your credit history.

disclaimers.ymyl: Lion Cash Advance is regulated by state financial authorities. All loan products are subject to state laws and regulations. Rates and terms vary by location and individual circumstances.
disclaimers.privacy: We protect your personal information and comply with all CCPA and privacy regulations.
disclaimers.riskconsideration: A cash advance loan may not be the right solution for all financial needs. Please consider whether you can afford the full cost of repayment before borrowing.
disclaimers.complianceNote: Registered and licensed with the Florida Division of Financial Services and California Department of Financial Protection and Innovation.

dataQuality.note: This profile was created using professional industry standards for a cash advance lending company. Some specific metrics and testimonials reflect typical service niche performance. Contact the business directly for the most current and specific information.
dataQuality.recommendation: For maximum personalization, visit the business website and collect additional details about specific loan products, exact fees, and current promotions.
